mapper.select: SELECT productId, title, totalInvestingAmount, currentInvestingAmount, numberInvestors, status, finishedAt FROM product WHERE finishedAt > NOW() AND NOW() > startedAt
SELECT productId, title, totalInvestingAmount, currentInvestingAmount, numberInvestors, status, finishedAt FROM product WHERE productId = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET currentInvestingAmount = currentInvestingAmount + #{invest.investAmount}, numberInvestors = numberInvestors + 1 WHERE productId = #{productId} AND totalInvestingAmount > currentInvestingAmount + #{invest.investAmount}
